sentences: See programm oli veidi ebastabiilne ja abortis tihti.
Arvutiprogramm võib ära öelda, kui tekib tõrge.
context: The word 'programmi' is the genitive case form of 'programm', meaning 'of the program'. In this context, it refers to terminating or canceling a program's execution before it completes. This can be used in both technical contexts (stopping computer programs) and medical contexts (terminating pregnancy). The dictionary definition shows it means to terminate a program prematurely or to abort.
